Contact List REST API on FastAPI
  • Models
  • View page source

Models

The data models used in the application include:

  • Contact: Represents a contact entity with attributes such as first name, last name, email, phone number, birthday, and owner ID.

  • User: Represents a user with attributes such as email, password hash, verification status, active status, and avatar URL.

Type:

Additional information about the contact.

Type:

The user who owns this contact.

Type:

Bases: Base

Represents a user of the contact list application.

The unique identifier of the user.

Type:

int

email

The email address of the user.

Type:

str

The hashed password of the user.

Type:

str

is_verified

Whether the user’s email is verified.

Type:

bool

Whether the user is active.

Type:

bool

The URL of the user’s avatar.

Type:

str, optional

The list of contacts owned by the user.

Type:

verify_password(password)[source]

Verifies if the provided password matches the user’s hashed password.

Parameters:

password (str) – The plain password to verify.

Returns:

True if the password matches, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool
